rows.title: Power of three

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes.
Let's use the magic power of 3 to stay present and relax. 

Name 3 sounds you can hear right now.
Name 3 smells you can smell right now.
Name your 3 favourite foods.
What are 3 things you can be gratefful for right now.

At the end of a touch day, thinking of 3 things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.

rows.transcript:
Close your eyes.
Let's use the magic power of 3 to stay present and relax. 

Name 3 sounds you can hear right now.
Name 3 smells you can smell right now.
Name your 3 favourite foods.
What are 3 things you can be gratefful for right now.

At the end of a touch day, thinking of 3 things to be grateful for can help us find the courage to try again tomorrow.

text_1.eng: Looking after yourself matters. And how you feel matters too!

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they do not. And sometimes we do not quite know what to think... and that is totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are hard right now. You deserve good things and @global.app_name is here to support you every step of the way.
